title: FedExpress Verification Code
codeIsReady: Your verification code is ready. For your security, we need to confirm your identity before proceeding.
returnToFedExpress: 1. Return to the FedExpress verification page
neverShare: Never share this code with anyone
willNeverAsk: FedExpress will never ask for this code via phone or email
contactUsImmediately: If you didn’t request this code, please contact us immediately
